resources.string: Created by Matt Groening (also Futurama\'s creator), story of the Simpsons started in 1985 when Groening was contacted by Fox about an animated sitcom.
This is about the Simpson family, depiction of the middle class American which we follow their lifestyle in the city of Springfield
The craziest sitcom in America since 1989

27 seasons and more than 500 episodes. Since the beginning The Simpsons are released on the Fox network.

The serie has a lot of characters and guests, famous quotes, goodies and millions of fans worldwide.

After many years of success Fox decided to create The Simpsons Movie with a screenplay from Matt Groening!
